description:
Rae impresses her teacher and classmates at the academy with her proficiency in magic... and is quickly forced to put her skills into practice when a huge monster attacks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les monstres attaquent toujours quand nul ne s’y attend
When Monsters Attack, Unpreparedness Is the Greatest Enemy
जब मॉन्स्टर्स हमला करते हैं, बिना तैयारी के रहना बेवकूफी है
魔物の襲撃は油断大敵.
